subtitle: About Me!
content: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer focused on crafting great web experiences. Coding has been my passion since the days I started working with computers, but I've been working professionally as a Developer since 2015. I enjoy creating beautifully designed, intuitive and functional websites. I love working with and learning from passionate, smart and talented people who are looking to build meaningful products. I have experience ranging from designing websites to setting up web servers and everything in between. I also have a strong interest in cybersecurity and like creating IoT devices with the Raspberry Pi.
